title: Nana and the Vampires
description: The summer before seventh grade all Cyndy and her best friend Becky are planning to do is practice their cheers, ride their bikes and avoid their nemesis, Lizzy. When the house next door gets new tenants, curiosity leads both girls into an adventure they did not count on. They soon discover there is something different about the new neighbors. Cyndy is living next door to a family of vampires! Can two small town girls be friends with a mysterious, cute boy who also happens to be a vampire? Cyndy is willing to try, but Becky is not so sure. Is it really safe to hang out with vampires?
author: Cyndy Green
